summary.heading: Summary
summary.body: Reactive Resume is a free and open source resume builder that's built to make the mundane tasks of creating, updating and sharing your resume as easy as 1, 2, 3. With this app, you can create multiple resumes, share them with recruiters or friends through a unique link and print it as a PDF, all for free, no ads, no tracking, without losing the integrity and privacy of your data.

list.import: Import data from LinkedIn, JSON Resume
list.export: Export your resume to JSON or PDF format
list.more: And much more exciting features, <1>read all about it here</1>
